snippet: According to the government, the arrested agent confessed to working in a “third country” under “the mask of religion” to plot against North Korea.
abstract: North Korea says it has arrested a spy sent by South Korea's intelligence agency.
lead_paragraph: According to the government, the arrested agent confessed to working in a “third country” under “the mask of religion” to plot against North Korea.

headline.main: North Korea Says It Arrested a South Korean Spy
headline.print_headline: North Korea: Arrest of Spy Reported
